headline: Here's Why Hold Strategy Is Apt for Imperial Oil Stock Now
summary: IMO shows strong production, progress in lower-emission projects, ExxonMobil-backed advantages and integrated stability, while chemical softness, tech delays and price-driven cash flow risks remain.

headline: The power companies cashing in on Miliband’s net zero blitz
summary: Surging energy costs may be blighting many British companies, but for the monopolies feeding electricity around the nation’s power grids, business has never been better.
